name: Slow-cooker Lentil, Chickpea and Spinach Stew
description: A slow cooker supper that simmers away and does all the dinner work for you!

ingredients.name: Cinco Pepper Blend
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or pepper blend of your choice

preparation: Sauté onion in oil with Cinco Pepper Blend and Greek Dressing Seasoning.
Turn onions into a slow cooker and add next 5 ingredients. Cook on HIGH for 4 hours or on LOW for 8 hours.
About 15 minutes before serving, stir in spinach and yogurt.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.
